name: Reginaldo Rossi
description: '''Reginaldo Rodrigues dos Santos''' (14 February 1944 â€“ 20 December 2013), better known by his stage name '''Reginaldo Rossi''', was a Brazilian musician and singer-songwriter. He was known as the "King of [[Brega (music)|Brega]]" ({{langx|pt|"Rei do brega"}}).
